//upload "formulas.txt" into Google Drive
//create Google Sheets file and run this code in the Google Apps Script extension

function writeFormulasToSheet() {
  const folder = DriveApp.getFoldersByName("Data").next(); //insert GD directory with "formulas.txt"
  const file = folder.getFilesByName("formulas.txt").next();

  const formulas = file.getBlob().getDataAsString().split("\n");

  const sheet = SpreadsheetApp.getActiveSpreadsheet().getActiveSheet();

  let row = 1;
  formulas.forEach(formula => {
    sheet.getRange(row, 1).setValue(formula);
    row += 1299;  // Move to the next row, separated by 1299 lines
  });
}

//after running the code export the file with the name "dataset1.csv"
